env.doc: The application environment taken from NODE_ENV environment variable

DEBUG.doc: Turns on verbose logging and other integrity checks for new plugins

serverName.doc: The full name of the server displayed by the App

serverNameShort.doc: The short name of the server displayed by the app

version.doc: a text string representing the version of the app

port.doc: an integer port number that the server listens on

urlPrefix.doc: A prfix to mount the server somewhere other than the root

home.doc: This section has the same format as a register config, but renders the home page instead

appDescriptionMD.doc: A markdown description of the App - displayed on the home page

version.doc: a text string representing the version of the app

static.doc: folder from which the server finds static files, relative to project

template.doc: html file template for the home page inside which rendered markdown is inserted

narrative.doc: markdown file relative to server path

registers.doc: An array of register objects with the same structure as `home`
